attributes.action: keep Arlene Phillips as a judge in Strictly Come Dancing!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Love Alesha Dixon but believe Arlene should stay as a judge. Alesha is a  great singer/dancer/pop star but doesn't have Arlene's experience. The show just won't be the same without Arlene's knowledge, glamour or comments. Very sad for Strictly fans!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
